QuestData.Title: Fight the Hammer
QuestData.Description: You've done what I thought was impossible! I'm done moping around here. It's time to gnome up.$B$BI've got to find my father. But you! Don't bother yourself with me any longer. You've got to keep fighting these cultists.$B$BGo talk to Ashlan Stonesmirk to the east. He's trying to stop the Twilight's Hammer, but he has nobody to help him. You're his only hope!$B$BDon't give up, $n. I won't.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Ashlan Stonesmirk near Mo'grosh Stronghold in Loch Modan.
QuestData.RewardText: You hit the twilight camp at the center of the lake? Not bad, $glad:lass;!$B$BIf you're ready to take the fight right to their doorstep, I've got your chance.
